texts.Error:MissingApiKey: The API key is not configured. Please set the API key to continue.
texts.GoogleApi:Status:0: Google API - An Unknown error has occured.
texts.GoogleApi:Status:6: Google API - Maximum element count exceeded.
texts.GoogleApi:Status:8: Google API - One or more Locations could not be found.
texts.Error:MissingSearchEngineId: A custom search engine id is required for the Google search API. See https://developers.google.com/custom-search/docs/tutorial/creatingcse for details.
texts.Error:UnableToValidateAuthentication: Unable to validate the authentication settings. Log out and then back in and try the request again.
texts.Settings:APIKey:Description: Your application's API key (required). This assumes that the API has access to all necessary endpoints (maps, places, search, and translate)
texts.Settings:MapsApiKey:Description: Your application's API key for access Google Maps endpoints. If this is not set, the system fails over to using the general APIKey value.
texts.Settings:PlacesApiKey:Description: Your application's API key for access Google Places endpoints. If this is not set, the system fails over to using the general APIKey value.
texts.Settings:SearchApiKey:Description: Your application's API key for access Google Search endpoints. If this is not set, the system fails over to using the general APIKey value.
texts.Settings:TranslateApiKey:Description: Your application's API key for access Google Translate endpoints. If this is not set, the system fails over to using the general APIKey value.
texts.Settings:ClientId:Description: The client ID provided to you by Google Enterprise Support, or null to disable URL signing. All client IDs begin with a "gme-" prefix.
texts.Settings:RequireGranularPermissions:Desc: Require granular permissions to be granted in order to use the API, as opposed to only requiring authentication. Defaults to false.
texts.Settings:RequireAuthentication:Descripti: Require calls to the API to come from authenticated users onle. Defaults to true.
texts.Settings:SearchEngineId:Description: Required for google search requests. Search engine created for a site with the Google Control Panel.
texts.Settings:IncludePremiumEndpoints:Descrip: Google APIs have some premium endpoints (like the Speed Limits API) that are not available for trial use. Defaults to true.
